scripts.build:web: cd web && vite build && cp -r web/dist ../dist-web || true
scripts.build: npm run build:web && tsc -p tsconfig.json && mkdir -p dist/electron && cp -r web/dist dist/electron/renderer || true
scripts.build:installer: echo 'Use Inno Setup to create installer from dist/electron'
scripts.rust:build: cd rust-extension && wasm-pack build --target web --out-dir ../web/public/wasm || true
